trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its global assembly cache membership.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en samling tilhører en kodegruppe ved å teste det global assembly cache medlemskapet.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan arves.

trans-unit.source: All assemblies installed in the global assembly cache are granted the `FullTrust` permission set.
trans-unit.target: Alle samlinger som er installert på den globale samlingsbufferen gis den `FullTrust` som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Code satisfies this membership condition if it is installed in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: Koden oppfyller dette medlemskapsvilkår Hvis det er installert på den globale samlingsbufferen.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den angitte bevis oppfyller medlemskapsbetingelse.

trans-unit.source: This membership condition tests <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled> evidence.
trans-unit.target: Denne medlemskapsvilkår tester <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled>bevis.</xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"> </xref> mot vil foreta testen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte bevis oppfyller medlemskapsvilkår; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en tilsvarende kopi av Medlemskapsvilkåret.

trans-unit.source: A copy of a membership condition is identical to the original membership condition.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av et medlemskapsvilkår er identisk med det opprinnelige Medlemskapsvilkåret.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Angir om det gjeldende objektet tilsvarer det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: There are no degrees of global assembly cache membership.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes ingen grader for global assembly cache medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: An assembly is either in the cache or it is not.
trans-unit.target: En samling i hurtigbufferen for eller ikke.

trans-unit.source: If the object identified by `o` is a <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>, then the objects being compared are equal.
trans-unit.target: Hvis objektet som er angitt med `o` er en <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>, og deretter objektene som sammenlignes er like.</xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` only if `o` is `null` or if `o` is not a <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `false` bare hvis `o` er `null` eller hvis `o` er ikke en <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal sammenlignes med det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: if o is a ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if o is a ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified XML encoding to reconstruct a security object.
trans-unit.target: Bruker den angitte XML-koding for å Bygg opp et sikkerhetsobjekt.

trans-unit.source: The FromXml method reconstructs a <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> from an XML encoding defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FromXml Rekonstruerer et <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>fra en XML-koding er definert av <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>klasse.</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> </xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.ToXml%2A> method to XML-encode the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> including state information.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.ToXml%2A>metoden XML-kode den <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>inkludert statusinformasjon.</xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> </xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.ToXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> that contains the XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> som inneholder XML kodingen som skal brukes til Bygg opp sikkerhetsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: e is .
trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: e is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: eer ikke et gyldig medlemskap betingelse-element.

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified XML encoding to reconstruct a security object, using the specified policy level context.
trans-unit.target: Bruker den angitte XML for å Bygg opp et sikkerhetsobjekt ved å bruke den angitte policy nivå konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The policy level context is provided for resolution of named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: Policyen nivå konteksten er angitt for løsing av navngitt tillatelse Sett referanser.

trans-unit.source: For example, code groups use policy level to find named permission sets.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel bruke koden grupper policy-nivå til å finne navngitt tillatelse angir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> that contains the XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> som inneholder XML kodingen som skal brukes til Bygg opp sikkerhetsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref> context for resolving <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref> references.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"> </xref> konteksten for å løse <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"> </xref> referanser.

trans-unit.source: e is .
trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: e is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: eer ikke et gyldig medlemskap betingelse-element.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: Henter en hash-kode for gjeldende medlemskapsvilkår.

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method returns 0 (zero) because <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> objects have no properties to distinguish one from another.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetHashCode returnerer 0 (null) fordi <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>objekter har ingen egenskaper å skille dem fra en annen.</xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 0 (null).

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en strengrepresentasjon av Medlemskapsvilkåret.

trans-unit.source: The string representation for <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> is "GAC".
trans-unit.target: Strengrepresentasjon for <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>er "GAC".</xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: En strengrepresentasjon av Medlemskapsvilkåret.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding sikkerhet og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A> method to restore the state information from a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A>metoden for å gjenopprette statusinformasjon fra <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> </xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> that contains the XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> som inneholder XML-kodingen for sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state, using the specified policy level context.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding sikkerhet og den gjeldende tilstanden, ved å bruke den angitte policy nivå konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The policy level context is provided for resolution of named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: Policyen nivå konteksten er angitt for løsing av navngitt tillatelse Sett referanser.

trans-unit.source: For example, code groups use policy level to find named permission sets.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel bruke koden grupper policy-nivå til å finne navngitt tillatelse angir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"></xref> context for resolving <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref> references.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel"> </xref> konteksten for å løse <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"> </xref> referanser.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> that contains the XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> som inneholder XML-kodingen for sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.
